scripts.release:cli:win: pnpm build:main && pnpm bundle:cli && pnpm exec pkg dist/cli/main.cjs -t node20-win-x64 -o release/cli/bili_lottery-cli-win-x64.exe
scripts.release:cli:mac: pnpm build:main && pnpm bundle:cli && pnpm exec pkg dist/cli/main.cjs -t node20-macos-x64 -o release/cli/bili_lottery-cli-macos-x64 && pnpm exec pkg dist/cli/main.cjs -t node20-macos-arm64 -o release/cli/bili_lottery-cli-macos-arm64
scripts.release:cli:linux: pnpm build:main && pnpm bundle:cli && pnpm exec pkg dist/cli/main.cjs -t node20-linux-x64 -o release/cli/bili_lottery-cli-linux-x64 && pnpm exec pkg dist/cli/main.cjs -t node20-linux-arm64 -o release/cli/bili_lottery-cli-linux-arm64
scripts.release:cli: pnpm build:main && pnpm bundle:cli && node scripts/release-cli.mjs --current
scripts.release:cli:all: pnpm build:main && pnpm bundle:cli && node scripts/release-cli.mjs

scripts.release:gui:linux: pnpm build && pnpm bundle:gui && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --linux
